704890f-a.text:
Herkimer Street, north side, between Prescott and Bancroft Places,
showing Public School No. 28.
P. L. Sperr  July 13, 1940
N9y N..N-777
704890f-a.folder: Herkimer Street & Prescott Place, Brooklyn, NY

704891f-a.text:
975 to 987 (left to right) Herkimer Street, north side, at the head of Prescott Place. No. 977 is a remodelled house; it was formerly a frame dwelling like the one to the left of it. No. 979 is Engine
2S7 of the New York City Fire Department.
July 13, 1940
P. L. Sperr
